aka: Nena feat. Dave Stewart: Be My Rebel

cast.name: 大卫·A·斯图瓦特 David A. Stewart

writer.name: 维吉尔·维德里希 Virgil Widrich

director.name: 维吉尔·维德里希 Virgil Widrich

this_title: Nena & Dave Stewart: Be My Rebel
trans_title: Nena feat. Dave Stewart: Be My Rebel
introduction: "Be my rebel", the first collaboration of the two music legends Nena and Dave Stewart, directed by Oscar-nominated filmmaker Virgil Widrich transfers the story into a dreamlike world powered by Dave Stewart's classic modular synthesizers.
chinese_title: Nena & Dave Stewart: Be My Rebel
